Package game.movement

Class FollowMateBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.movement.FollowBehaviour
game.movement.FollowMateBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class FollowMateBehaviour extends FollowBehaviour
Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor following another DinoActor to mate with it.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static String
    DESCRIPTION
    Description of the motivation of the behaviour to be printed out as a message in the console if the Actor actually follows a mate in the end.
    private static int
    MAX_RADIUS
    Maximum number of squares from DinoActor to search for a mate to follow.
    private static int
    MIN_RADIUS
    Minimum number of squares from DinoActor to start searching for a mate to follow.

    Description
    private static boolean
    breedingPossible​(DinoActor actorAsDino, DinoActor anotherDino)
    Returns true if two DinoActors passed in are of different sex, same species and both capable to breed to indicate it is possible for mating to happen, false otherwise.
    (package private) Location
    findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
    Checks if there is a mate that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) boolean
    motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor can breed to indicate that it will attempt to follow another DinoActor to mate with it, false otherwise.

      Constructor.

  • Method Details

    • motivatedToFollow

      boolean motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
      Returns true if the DinoActor can breed to indicate that it will attempt to follow another DinoActor to mate with it, false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      motivatedToFollow in class FollowBehaviour
      Parameters:
      dinoActor - DinoActor that is acting
      Returns:
      true if DinoActor can breed, false otherwise

    • findTarget

      Location findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
      Checks if there is a mate that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination. If there is a mate that it can breed with, the destination will be returned for the DinoActor to move towards it, null will be returned otherwise.
      Specified by:
      findTarget in class FollowBehaviour
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the Actor is currently on
      destination - Location that is checked for a potential mate
      actorAsDino - DinoActor that is trying to follow a mate
      Returns:
      A location if a potential mate to follow is on it, null otherwise

    • breedingPossible

      private static boolean breedingPossible​(DinoActor actorAsDino, DinoActor anotherDino)
      Returns true if two DinoActors passed in are of different sex, same species and both capable to breed to indicate it is possible for mating to happen, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      actorAsDino - DinoActor
      anotherDino - another DinoActor
      Returns:
      true if the DinoActors can breed, false otherwise
